compounddef.title: FULLFILE Build a Full Filename From Pieces

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: The fullfile routine constructs a full filename from a set of pieces, namely, directory names and a filename. The syntax is: x = fullfile(dir1,dir2,...,dirn,filename) where each of the arguments are strings. The fullfile function is equivalent to [dir1 dirsep dir2 dirsep ... dirn dirsep filename].
